item.title: Second
item.description: GIT教程 QPushButton-paintEvent 源码分析 void QPushButton::paintEvent(QPaintEvent *) { QStylePainter p(this); QStyleOptionButton option; initStyleOption(&option); p.drawControl(QStyle::CE_PushButton, option); } 调用关系 调用QStylePainter的内联函数 inline void drawControl(QStyle::ControlElement ce, const QStyleOption &opt); // 私有成员变量 private: QWidget *widget; QStyle *wstyle; // 定义 void QStylePainter::drawControl(QStyle::ControlElement ce, const QStyleOption &opt) { wstyle->drawControl(ce, &opt, this, widget); } 调用QStyle的纯虚函数 virtual void drawControl(ControlElement element, const QStyleOption *opt, QPainter *p, const QWidget *w = nullptr) const = 0; // 定义 void QCommonStyle::drawControl(ControlElement element, const QStyleOption *opt, QPainter *p, const QWidget *widget) const { Q_D(const QCommonStyle); switch (element) { case CE_PushButton: if (const QStyleOptionButton *btn = qstyleoption_cast<const QStyleOptionButton *>(opt)) { proxy()->drawControl(CE_PushButtonBevel, btn, p, widget); QStyleOptionButton subopt = *btn; subopt.
